title: Associate Director of Pension Investments at Access Staffing (New York City, NY)
text: Source: The Ladders Fortune 100 Conglomerate seeks degree; (MBA or CFA a +) with 8+ years in leadership/management role reporting to Director of Corporate Finance. Responsible for managing external investment consultants, investment managers, trustees and custodians. Develop and recommend investment policies and strategies to the internal pension fund committee. Recommend asset allocation policies; dealing with capital market assumptions and funding status targets. Coordinate rebalancing of assets. Assist in preparation of various corporate reports (10q, 5500, and Board of Director reports). Liaise with consultants in conducting asset/liability. Evaluate funding and expense requests. Work with Legal in reviewing investment management and service level agreements. Manage SOX control requirements and ensure compliance with laws and regulations. Additional responsibilities include overseeing treasury related issues for high end reporting division. Experience with asset management or knowledge of risk and performance measurements a +. Strong interpersonal, communication skills as well as the ability to deal with complex investment management issues. Knowledge of financialreporting standards a +. Understanding of fiduciary duties also a +. MS Suite. AN EQUAL EMPLOYMENT OPPORTUNITY EMPLOYER * * 2147483647
